profile.name: Jane
profile.title: Alabaster Corpse Jane
profile.story: She was once the princess of the fallen Dukedom of Gray. The Dukedom of Gray, wiped off the map by the Demon invaders during the Demon War, was the protector of countless secrets, including the ruins and technologies of an ancient civilization. Jane, too, lost her life to protect those secrets. Later, she was brought back to the world as an undead by Malduk, a high-ranking officer and a strategist of the Demon Army. She was given a new consciousness by a strange, dark magic. Now, she seeks to go on a journey to find her past self and her lost memories.

1.name: Funeral Rites
1.description: Deals [ffc800]361*(1+0.3Skill Level)+277.6% of Attack Power[-] damage to enemies within range and [fa96fa]stuns[-] them for [64ffff]3 sec[-].

2.name: Mark of Death
2.description: Engraves [fa96fa][Mark of Death][-] on all enemies for [64ffff]15 sec[-], dealing [ffc800]9(1+0.3Skill Level)+6.9% of Attack Power[-] continuous Magic Damage. Enemies with [fa96fa][Mark of Death][-] take [ff6464]25%[-] increased Magic Damage, and if recast within [64ffff]15 sec[-], the effect is increased by [64ff64]20%[-]. This effect stacks up to [64ffff]5 times[-] and cannot be dispelled.

3.name: Day of Ruin
3.description:
Deals [ffc800]127(1+0.3Skill Level)+97.6% of Attack Power[-] Magic Damage per second to all enemies for [64ffff]12 sec[-], recovers HP equal to [ffc800]130%[-] of damage dealt, and has a [64ffff]10%[-] chance to [fa96fa]stun[-] them for [64ffff]0.6 sec[-].
During the duration, all allies take [64ff64]20%[-] reduced Physical Damage, and enemies with [fa96fa][Mark of Death][-] take additional Magic Damage equal to [ffc800]97.6% of Attack Power[-].

4.name: Rest in Peace
4.description:
Increases all allies’ Physical Defense by [64ff64]45(1+0.3Skill Level)[-].
When taking damage that would be fatal, enters [fa96fa][Coffin][-] state for [64ffff]5 sec[-], restoring [64ff64]197(1+0.3Skill Level)+153.7% of Attack Power[-] + [64ff64]6%[-] of Max HP.
While in [fa96fa][Coffin][-] state, Attack Speed changes do not affect you, you are [fa96fa]immune[-] to all damage, and deal Magic Damage equal to [ffc800]5%[-] of Max HP per second to nearby enemies.

light.effect: Recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt.

dark.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, but pulls the target to your vicinity with a 100% success rate.

light.effect: Debuff duration is reduced to 10 sec, but damage is increased by 500%.

dark.effect: [Mark of Death] cannot be removed by cleansing harmful effects.
Mana cost is increased by 1000, but cooldown is reduced by 7 sec.

light.effect: When the effect triggers, removes all beneficial effects from all enemies.

dark.effect: When the effect triggers, [fa96fa]stuns[-] all enemies for 1.2 sec.
On hit, Attack and Healing are increased by 1%. This effect stacks up to 50 times.

uw.name: Unchanging Mind, Erekura
uw.description:
Deals Magic Damage equal to {0}% of Attack Power per second to nearby enemies, reduces their Attack by {1}%, and recovers HP equal to 75% of damage dealt.
The 4 allies with the highest Attack (excluding yourself) deal {2}% increased damage to non-hero enemies. This effect cannot be dispelled.
uw.story: When Malduk's magic resurrected Jane as an undead, she should not have felt anything. Yet, she felt warm and comfortable as mysterious energy surrounded her dead body. She should not have been able to even feel it. But when Malduk took her, she instinctively reached out to the warm presence. Later, when a mysterious magic brought her back to consciousness, the first thing she did was to inspect her coffin, which radiated with tragic yet warm love. Inside, she found the following message carefully engraved: 'My unchanging love for you.'

1.name: Funeral Doll
1.description: [Funeral Rites] reduces the target’s CC Resist by 400 and Magic Block chance by {0} for 4 sec.
1.story:
A doll used in funeral ceremonies in the Dukedom of Gray.
 It is normally made to look like the deceased and put in front of the tombstone. After the Dukedom fell and Jane died, people put this doll beside her body.

2.name: Death-imbued Cushion
2.description: [Mark of Death] When a marked enemy dies, increases own ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by {0}% for 20 sec. Stacks up to 16 times.
2.story:
The cushion that Jane hugs to sleep inside the coffin. It's imbued with the spirits that fell asleep with her inside the coffin. 
They constantly give the hollowness of death to Jane.

3.name: Flowers of a Forgotten Dukedom
3.description: [Day of Ruin] increases DMG by {0}% and reduces the target’s M.DEF by 3% for 5 sec each time damage is dealt. This effect can stack up to 10 times.
3.story: A flower of the Dukedom that can no longer be found. It is also known as the Flower of Boundaries that connects life and death, and it gets its nourishment from destruction. A painfully beautiful flower. If you gift it to someone, you will be able to share that person's last moment in a dream.

4.name: First Friend Doll
4.description: [Rest in Peace] reduces all DMG taken by {0}% for 10 sec after use. Cooldown set to 40 sec.
4.story:
A doll that looks just like Rephy, Jane's first friend.
Jane froze in front of a shop selling poison.
Seeing Jane's eyes locked on the limited edition of Rephy Doll on the shop display, Epis decided to buy her the doll.
Since the doll could only be purchased with mileage, Epis was almost crying after spending all her pocket money. However, Jane's smile after getting this doll as her first friend was probably worth it.
